Tweet href="http://digg.com/submit?url=http://www.earthtimes.org/articles/news/365427,describing- Elizabeth Hurley - Elizabeth Hurley - hot.html"> Wellington- href="http://www.earthtimes.org/tag/New-Zealand.html"> New Zealand Prime Minister John Key Wednesday defended describing British actress and model Elizabeth Hurley as`` hot'' in a radio interview, saying, I think she'd be thrilled by the endorsement.`` John Key , married to his childhood sweetheart and father of two teenagers, rejected criticism that he was being sexist in the interview with a href="http://www.earthtimes.org/tag/sports.html"> sports commentator last week.In a discussion about his sporting idols, John Key was asked by host Tony Veitch if he'd like to be Australian cricketer Shane Warne .`` Yeah, well, given his current liaison with Elizabeth Hurley , John Key said.`` I like Elizabeth Hurley , actually. In M'Pouto, a district to the east of the Golf Hotel, anti-Alassane Ouattara feelings run high among the Gbagbo-supporting Ebri community. We have held many meetings and our message is clear: those in the Golf Hotel should leave. They do not recognize president Gbagbo as the head of state. We are ready to dislodge him[ Alassane Ouattara ] soon, said one resident, Antoine. The next step is to reduce U.S. unemployment, an issue Barack Obama should make`` the centerpiece'' of his annual State of the Union address on Jan. 25, the former Cabinet member said. The American people are expecting him to say something about what he's going to do to keep the economy moving forward, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell has criticized his own party in recent months while supporting Barack Obama 's ultimately successful fight for Senate ratification of a new nuclear-arms-reduction treaty with Russia.
